import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col,Image, ListGroup,Card, Button, ListGroupItem,FormControl} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [qty,setQty] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) },[dispatch,match]) const product = [] return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ₹ {product.Price} Description: {product.description} Price: ₹ {product.Price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In stock' : 'Out of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty {setQty(e.target.value)}}> { [...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( )) } )} ) } export default ProductScreen
